text: The AVN Award for Best Actress is an award that has been given by sex industry company AVN since the award ceremony's inception in 1984. As of January 2020, the titleholder is Angela White. ==Winners and nominees== ===1984–1989=== {| class=wikitable |- |align=center|Year |align=center|Photo |align=center|Winner |align=center|Nominees
